    • Method Detail

      • initializeMenu

        private void initializeMenu()
        a method used to help the constructor initialize the menu. Note: If we decide we want the menu system to be resizeable, we will have to change the pixel positions to be precentage of screen size based, not static as they are now

      • finalizeSettingsClick

        private void finalizeSettingsClick()
        A method that is called when the finalize settings button is clicked. Sets all of the menu controller static fields properly.
